effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Causes the target to flinch. Can only be used on the user’s first turn after entering the field.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Causes the target to flinch. Can only be used on the user’s first turn after entering the field.

short_effect.x_y: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle. Causes the target to flinch.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle. Causes the target to flinch.

flavor_text.x_y: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.
